content.description: The following question refers to the topic of the Second World War.
content.question: The German military’s development of blitzkrieg tactics in the period just before the Second World War is best explained in the context of

choices.label: the increasing use of technology to monitor and control citizens of the German state
advances in transportation and communication technology
increases in the size of Germany’s military-age population
the failure of Western democracies to fully modernize their militaries

content.answer: advances in transportation and communication technology

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
